src:
SEA Games 2019: Filanesia, Danurwindo, dan Emas Bola Terakhir 91
04 Nov 2019, 09:03 by Tempo.co, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ketua Umum PSSI yang baru, Mochamad Iriawan, begitu dilantik menegaskan bahwa ada target besar yang sudah ada di depan mata, yaitu pesta olahraga multicabang Asia Tenggara, yaitu SEA Games 2019 di Filipina yang dimulai 30 November mendatang.
Sebelum pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023, pelatih Indra Sjafri sudah dibebani target oleh PSSI untuk bisa membawa tim nasional Indonesia U-23 meraih medali emas dalam SEA Games 2019.
Target yang berat. Pasalnya, sejak SEA Games 1991 di Filipina, tim sepak bola Indonesia tidak pernah lagi bisa meraih emas pada pesta olahraga Asia Tenggara yang berlangsung dua tahun sekali itu.
Adapun pada final sepak bola SEA Games 1991 di Stadion Rizal Memorial, Manila itu, ketika mengalahkan Thailand melalui adu penalti, ada salah satu tokohnya yang pada periode kepengurusan PSSI 2016-2020 menjabat sebagai Direktur Teknik PSSI, yaitu Danurwindo.
Dua puluh delapan tahun lalu, Danurwindo menjadi asisten dari pelatih kepala tim Indonesia untuk SEA Games 1991 asal Rusia, Anatoli Polosin, bersama asisten pelatih yang lain, Vladimir Urin.
Selain terkenal dengan kedisiplinannya, Polosin -yang kini sudah almarhum- termashur dengan metode latihan fisiknya yang sangat keras. Polosin dikenal dengan metodenya, shadow football. Latihan tanpa bola yang berfokus kepada penempaan fisik, stamina, dan mengasah naluri.
Sejumlah pemain tim nasinal saat itu muntah-muntah dan tidak tahan dengan metode ala Polosin itu. Ada yang sempat kabur atau malah mundur total.
Tapi, dengan pemilihan satu sudut pandang yang fokus tersebut, tim Indonesia mampu mengalahkan momok mereka di sepak bola, Thailand, pada final SEA Games 1991 melalui adu penalti 4-3 setelah 0-0 pada pertandingan normal.
Pemain era SEA Games 1991 yang sekarang beredar sebagai pelatih di Liga 1 2019, antara lain Aji Santoso yang baru saja kembali menangani Persebaya, Bambang Nurdiansyah melatih PSIS Semarang, dan Sudirman di tim Persija junior.
Jika Polosin bisa membawa tim Indonesia meraih emas terakhir pada SEA Games karena konsistensinya menguatkan fisik pemainnya, semoga saja Indra Sjafri yang juga konsisten menangani tim nasional usia muda bisa memetik hasilnya di stadion yang sama.
Adapun Danuwirndo dalam kapasitasnya sebagai Direktur Teknik PSSI 1996-2020 adalah konseptor buat pemasok para pemain muda yang masuk skuad Indra Sjafri ke SEA Games 2019.
Dalam situs resmi PSSI, yaitu pssi.org, disebutkan bahwa untuk memanfaatkan potensi yang besar dari sepak bola, PSSI telah merumuskan Filosofi Sepak Bola Indonesia (Filanesia) yang dituangkan dalam buku Kurikulum Pembinaan Sepakbola Indonesia.
Filanesia adalah sebuah filosofi yang akan menjadi fondasi dan karakter sepak bola Indonesia, baik untuk pembinaan usia dini sampai profesional dari segi individu maupun tim.
Filosofi ini telah menjadi salah satu perhatian khusus kepengurusan PSSI periode 2016-2020. Di bawah komando Direktur Teknik PSSI Danurwindo, langkah awal pembentukan filosofi ini dilakukan sejak awal 2017.
Mereka menyatakan mengembangkan gaya sepak bola khas Indonesia ini setelah menjalani studi, praktek lapangan, diskusi panel, dan seminar dengan seluruh pelatih Liga 1, praktisi olahraga, dan personel teknis lainnya.
Filosofi ini disebutkan akan memberikan panduan dalam hal lingkup sepak bola, seperti penjenjangan latihan berdasarkan usia, pengembangan teknik pemain, dan ciri-ciri bermain di lapangan.
Disebutkan juga bahwa bahwa Kurikulum Pembinaan Sepak Bola Indonesia ini bukan untuk menyeragamkan taktik setiap klub, namun ini akan menjadi ciri pemain Indonesia di pentas Internasional.
Lebih dalam, di dalam buku ini dikelompokkan beberapa fase latihan berdasarkan kelompok umur. Untuk anak-anak usia 6 sampai 9 tahun disebut sebagai fase pengenalan, lalu fase pengembangan skill di rentang usia 10 sampai 13 tahun, lalu terakhir ada rentang usia 14 sampai 17 tahun yang merupakan fase permainan.
Peluncuran resmi Filosofi Sepak Bola Indonesia dilakukan pada 9 November 2017 di Jakarta. Dari Filanesia ini Timnas U-16, Timnas U-19, dan Timnas U-23 yang akan berangkat ke SEA Games 2019 itu dikembangkan.
Kini setelah Iwan Bule dikukuhkan menjadi Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023, belum diketahui apakah Danurwindo –yang komentarnya jarang dikutip media dan juga jarang “bicara”- akan dipertahankan atau tidak.
Tapi, yang jelas, ia akan senang kalau tim Indonesia bisa meraih medali emas sepak bola lagi dalam SEA Games 2019, setelah 28 tahun.
text:
SEA Games 2019: Filanesia, Danurwindo, and Last Ball Gold 91
04 Nov 2019, 09:03 by Tempo.co, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The new Chairperson of PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan, was inaugurated to emphasize that there is a big target that is already in front of us, namely the Southeast Asian multicabment sports party, namely the 2019 SEA Games in the Philippines which starts on 30 November.
Before the man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule was elected as Chairman of the PSSI 2019-2023 period, coach Indra Sjafri has been burdened by the target by PSSI to be able to bring the Indonesian U-23 national team to win a gold medal in the 2019 SEA Games.
Heavy target. The reason is, since the 1991 SEA Games in the Philippines, Indonesian football teams have never been able to win gold again at the Southeast Asian Games which take place every two years.
As for the 1991 SEA Games soccer final at Rizal Memorial Stadium, Manila, when defeating Thailand on penalties, there was one of the figures who in the 2016-2020 PSSI management period served as Technical Director of PSSI, Danurwindo.
Twenty-eight years ago, Danurwindo was an assistant to the head coach of the Indonesian team for the 1991 SEA Games from Russia, Anatoli Polosin, along with another assistant coach, Vladimir Urin.
As well as being famous for its discipline, Polosin - which is now deceased - is famous for its rigorous physical training methods. Polosin is known by its method, shadow football. Ballless training that focuses on physical forging, stamina, and sharpening instincts.
A number of national team players at that time vomited and could not stand the Polosin-style method. There were those who had run away or even backed down completely.
But, with the selection of one focus point of view, the Indonesian team was able to defeat their scourge in football, Thailand, in the 1991 SEA Games final on a 4-3 penalty shootout after 0-0 in a normal match.
Players in the 1991 SEA Games era are now circulating as coaches in League 1 2019, including Aji Santoso who has just returned to deal with Persebaya, Bambang Nurdiansyah coached PSIS Semarang, and Sudirman in the Persija junior team.
If Polosin can bring the Indonesian team to win the last gold at the SEA Games because of its consistency to physically strengthen its players, hopefully Indra Sjafri who also consistently handles the young national team can reap the rewards at the same stadium.
Danuwirndo in his capacity as Technical Director of PSSI 1996-2020 is a drafter for suppliers of young players who enter Indra Sjafri's squad at the 2019 SEA Games.
In the PSSI official website, namely pssi.org, it is mentioned that to utilize the great potential of football, PSSI has formulated the Indonesian Football Philosophy (Filanesia) as outlined in the Indonesian Football Development Curriculum book.
Filanesia is a philosophy that will be the foundation and character of Indonesian football, both for early childhood to professional development in terms of individuals and teams.
This philosophy has become one of the special concerns of the 2016-2020 PSSI management. Under the command of PSSI Danurwindo Technical Director, the initial steps to form this philosophy have been carried out since early 2017.
They claimed to develop this unique Indonesian style of football after undergoing studies, field practice, panel discussions, and seminars with all League 1 coaches, sports practitioners, and other technical personnel.
This philosophy is said to provide guidance in terms of the scope of football, such as age-based training, development of player techniques, and characteristics of playing on the field.
It was also stated that the Indonesian Football Development Curriculum was not to uniform the tactics of each club, but this would characterize Indonesian players on the international stage.
Deeper, in this book, several phases of exercise are grouped according to age group. For children aged 6 to 9 years is called the introduction phase, then the phase of skill development in the age range of 10 to 13 years, then lastly there is the age range of 14 to 17 years which is the game phase.
The official launch of the Indonesian Football Philosophy was carried out on November 9, 2017 in Jakarta. From this Filanesia U-16 national team, U-19 national team, and U-23 national team that will depart for the 2019 SEA Games were developed.
Now that Iwan Bule has been confirmed as Chairman of the PSSI 2019-2023, it is not yet known whether Danurwindo - whose comments are rarely quoted by the media and also rarely "talk" - will be retained or not.
But, clearly, he would be happy if the Indonesian team could win the gold medal in football again in the 2019 SEA Games, after 28 years.
